dct_title_s: Description de touts les Pays-Bas, autrement appellez la Germanie Inferieure, ou Basse Allemagne
dct_alternative_sm: Descrittione di M. Lodovico Guicciardini patritio fiorentino, di tutti i Paesi Bassi
dct_description_sm: par Messire Loys Guicciardin Gentil-Homme Florentin ; maintenant reveü, & augmentée plus que de la moitié par le mesme autheur.
Gold-leafed decorative borders and seals on front and back covers and spine.
First 2 and last 2 pages blank (included in page description).
Engraved title page, head and tail-pieces throughout.
Illustrations of significant buildings (e.g. "Domus Senatoria Vlissingensis").
Descriptive text accompanies maps and on some maps.
Decorative borders, banners, cartouches, compass roses, rhumb lines, bar scales, tables of statistical information, coats of arms.
Maps show topography, vegetation, waterways, shoals, routes.
Illustrations of figures, flora, fauna, ships, sea monsters.
Latin, German, and Dutch on maps.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
